name: IDcentre
membership: Frontex, ICMPD, Europol, IOM, Olaf, ECB
goal: IDcentre is specialized in the development and implementation of competence development programs for governmental organizations in relation to the identification en authentication of persons, security documents, goods and related processes.
interests: Borders and Security, Customs, Education and training, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Fraud prevention, International co-operation and development, Migration and asylum
euInitiatives:
Protection of the Euro: OLAF, Pericles
Identity & ID-Document training for EU and global
VN, Frontex, ICMPD, Cepol, IOM, Europol
